message.content:
cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.NA, cs.SY, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with controlling epidemic spread on networks, which is a topic that falls under the subfield of social network analysis. Therefore, cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also presents approximation algorithms for reducing the spectral radius of a network, which involves graph theory and optimization, making cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) likely sub-categories as well. The paper also discusses the performance of different heuristics and algorithms, which falls under the subfield of machine learning, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with the practical application of the algorithms on real-world networks, which falls under the subfield of control theory, making cs.SY (Systems and Control) a possible sub-category.
